events.name: WOWZAPP 2012: Worldwide Hackathon for Windows -- Oslo, Norway
events.about:
Be part of the app revolution!

By registering, you’ll be joining thousands of developers worldwide as we build apps for the next generation of Windows.

Expert Help, Free Resources

Microsoft app experts, developers and trainers will be available on-site to assist your learning and coding. Learn about building Windows Store apps today – download the info, tools and resources you need now. 

Windows Azure Mobile Services

Does your Store app idea include cloud services or storage? Check out Get started withMobile Services –registered student WOWZAPP 2012 participants are eligible for a FREE student Windows Azure six-month subscription!– supplies are limited so be sure to register now!

events.name: Oslo Startup Weekend
events.about:
Startup Weekend is an intense weekend event which focuses on taking ideas to a business concept that could form the basis of a credible business. The weekend brings together people with different skillsets – software developers, graphics designers, business people, marketers musicians, creatives and various others – to build products and services and develop a commercial case around them. The event is as always open to any ideas and to everyone who want to experience a high-energy weekend of starting a new project.

We have been lucky to have access to some additional mentors and participants from the music industry this time, which means that if you want to work on a cultural or music related idea it’s a good opportunity to do so. Norway is strong on music-technology and we will give you some insight into the industry the week before the event during Oslo Innovation Week. At Startup Weekend Oslo in January 2011 Soundrop started it’s journey – recently raised $3m in funding june 2012 and they will tell their story at Mobile Monday 15th of October. Read the story. As we said, you don´t have to work on anything music related, but you may be inspired to do so

events.name: Oslo Startup Weekend 03/12
events.about:
Startup Weekend Oslo is an event that focuses on getting started with web and mobileconcepts with focused work over the weekend. The event brings together people who canprogramming, graphic design, marketing and business - to develop concepts andapplications with commercial potential.

Follow on twitter for updates
Startup Weekend is a non-profit organization that seeks to promote entrepreneurship across the world. In 2011, over 25,000 people in more than 67 countries and over 230 cities.
